QuestText.Upgrade1: Bring some items to upgrade your greenhouse's size.
Item1.Upgrade1: Drop off 100 Clay at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item2.Upgrade1: Drop off 50 Refined Quartz at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
QuestText.Upgrade2: Bring some more items to upgrade your greenhouse's size again.
Item1.Upgrade2: Drop off 200 Clay at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item2.Upgrade2: Drop off 150 Refined Quartz at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
QuestText.Upgrade3: Bring some more items to upgrade your greenhouse's size even more.
Item1.Upgrade3: Drop off 500 clay at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item2.Upgrade3: Drop off 25 iridium bars at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
QuestText.Upgrade4: Bring some more items to upgrade your greenhouse with automatic watering.
Item1.Upgrade4: Drop off 36 Iridium Sprinklers at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item2.Upgrade4: Drop off 100 Deluxe Retaining Soil at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item3.Upgrade4: Drop off 25 Radioactive Bars at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item4.Upgrade4: Drop off 20 Battery Packs at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
QuestText.Upgrade5: Bring some more items to upgrade your greenhouse with a dedicated tree area.
Item1.Upgrade5: Drop off 20 Clay at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item2.Upgrade5: Drop off 10 Iridium Bars at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
Item3.Upgrade5: Drop off 300 Wood at the Junimo Plant in the greenhouse.
